global.logoutMessage: Are you sure you want to exit the app?

calendar.title: Calendar
calendar.noWorkScheduleMessage: Clinic work schedule was not entered. Please ask your clinic administrator to setup clinic work schedule.
calendar.doctor_holiday: The doctor has a day off
calendar.clinic_day_off: The clinic has a day off

treatment.descriptionPlaceholder: Enter a short description for this visit ...

settings.title: Settings
settings.passwordFormMessage: Here you can change your account password. After changing your password you will be logged out from all devices.
settings.emailFormMessage: Please enter a valid email address and your current password to be able to update your account email.
settings.generalInformationMessage: Here you can change your personal information such as name and phone number. Name is required, so in order to save the form, please fill First and Last names.
settings.notificationsMessage: Here you can control which notifications you want to receive and which not.

notificationsSettings.newAppointment: Receive notifications when a new appointment is created
notificationsSettings.newAppointmentDescription: You will receive a notification each time someone will create an appointment for you
notificationsSettings.appointmentCanceledDescription: You will receive a notification when an appointment that is assigned to you is canceled.
notificationsSettings.patientChangeDescription: You will receive a notification when the patient will be changed, for an appointment that is assigned to you
notificationsSettings.dateChangeDescription: You will receive a notification if someone will change date or time for an appointment that is assigned to you
notificationsSettings.appointmentCanceled: Receive notifications when an appointment is canceled
notificationsSettings.patientChange: Receive notifications when the patient was changed in an appointment
notificationsSettings.serviceChange: Receive notifications when an appointment service was changed
notificationsSettings.dateChange: Receive notifications when an appointment date or time was changed
notificationsSettings.newStatus: Receive notifications when status of an appointment was set to %{status}

passwordCondition.capitalChar: At least one upper case character

settingsFaq.phoneNumber: Where will my phone number be used?
settingsFaq.phoneNumberMessage: Your phone number is only for informational purposes and it will not be used anywhere, therefore it is optional.
settingsFaq.notifications: Will notifications settings work on mobile too?
settingsFaq.notificationsMessage: Yes, same notifications settings will be applied to all your devices. You can change this setting either from mobile app or from here.

examinationCard.title: Patient Examination Card
examinationCard.overallCondition: Condition of the mucosa, gums, alveolar processes and hard palate

patientComments.noDataMessage: Client has no visits yet, here you will see all client's visits and you will be able to leave a comment to each visit.
patientComments.noVisitComment: This visit has no comments yet, please click on 'More' button to add images and/or comments

patientAppointments.noDataMessage: Client has no appointments yet, here will appear all client's appointments added by you or your colleagues.

patientNotes.noDataMessage: Type a note in the field below to add it to current patient.

patientGallery.noDataMessage: There are no images yet, add one by clicking the button above.
patientGallery.deleteImageMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this image?

planServicesContainer.emptyPlan: Plan is empty. Add service by clicking on a tooth, or by searching it in the field above.
planServicesContainer.removeServiceMessage: Are you sure you want to remove service from treatment plan?

visitsHistory.title: Visits History
visitsHistory.noVisitsMessage: This patient has no visits yet, they will appear automatically once patient will be in clinic.
visitsHistory.noServicesMessage: There are no services added or completed in this visit yet.
